name: Target: Vengeance
description:
This game is HTML and may only be ran in a web browser. WHATEVER YOU DO, DO NOT PREVENT THE SITE FROM PUSHING ANY ALERTS, this is how the text is shown because I'm lazy. 

The game has a total of 33 endings and has little animations that I created below it, Click on those animations if you want to see where they were made and who made them. All animations are uncolored because once again, I'm probably lazy.
